name: enhance-cli
description: Enhance CLI with: command completion, better help text, aliases, configuration wizard, update notifications
verification: Added CLI enhancements: 1) Tab completion script (completion.sh) with autocomplete for all commands, 2) Configuration wizard (autonomy wizard) - interactive setup for workstation, scheduler, web UI, 3) Command aliases (autonomy alias add/remove/list) - create shortcuts like 'autonomy alias add st status', 4) Update notifications (autonomy check-updates) - checks git for updates, 5) Version command (autonomy version) - shows current version. All features tested and working.
evidence: Enhanced help text with new commands
